sections.heading: Property; right-of-way; how procured
sections.text: Such sanitary district may acquire by purchase, condemnation, or otherwise, real or personal property, right-of-way, and privilege, within or without its corporate limits, necessary for its corporate purposes.SourceLaws 1891, c. 36, ยง 5, p. 290;R.S.1913, ยง 1935;C
